item.title: Help please. <3
item.dc:creator: @pot_up_pls pot up pls
item.description:
@pot_up_pls wrote:

okay, So i’ve got a ::dice command, but only I can use it. How would i make it, so only some certin Players can use it? i’ll Post my Dice command, Feel free to use it.

if(playerCommand.startsWith("dice")){ int random = Misc.random(100); c.forcedChat("[" + c.properName + "] I have rolled " + random + "% on the percentile dice."); c.sendMessage("You just rolled " + random);//chat Method, clan chat etc }

Read full topic
